humification_const.Description: Proportion of degraded carbon that is partitioned to humus-like organic matter

alpha.Description: Concentration of carbon in organic matter

tor.Description: Proportion of manure C degraded that is emitted as methane

IndirectNH3N2OFactor.Description: Emission factor for N2O emission from redeposited NH3 emissions

IndirectNO3N2OFactor.Description: Emission factor for N2O emission from leached NO3-N - IPCC (2006)

defaultBeddingCconc.Description: Concentration of carbon in default bedding dry matter

defaultBeddingNconc.Description: Concentration of nitrogen in default bedding dry matter

ErrorToleranceYield.Description: Maximum difference between expected and modelled yield of crops

ErrorToleranceGrazing.Description: Maximum difference between grazed crop DM and grazed crop intake

FOMdecompositionrate.Description: Decomposition rate of fresh organic matter

HUMdecompositionrate.Description: Decomposition rate of humic organic matter

ROMdecompositionrate.Description: Decomposition rate of resistant organic matter

fCO2.Description: Proportion of degraded humic and resistant organic matter emitted as CO2

ROMificationfraction.Description: Proportion of degraded humic organic matter that is partitioned to resistant organic matter

transportCoefficient.Description: Proportion of degraded organic matter transported to next layer

fert_EFNH3_IPCC.Description: Emission factor for NH3 and NOx - IPCC (2006)

man_EFNH3_IPCC.Description: Emission factor for NH3 and NOx - IPCC (2006)

minimumTimePeriod.Description: Minimum length of the period over which flows will be calculated

maximumIterations.Description: Maximum number of iterations of crop production before model gives up and generates an error
